name: rapdev.servicenow.statsdo_connection
description: Returns 'CRITICAL' if stats.do is inaccesible or unreadable 'OK' if otherwise

name: rapdev.servicenow.table_api_connection
description: Returns 'CRITICAL' if connection to table api is inaccessible, 'OK' if otherwise

name: rapdev.servicenow.itsm_check_online
description: Returns 'CRITICAL' if the ITSM check has reached an unrecoverable exception (e.g., not just an issue with a single incident), 'OK' if otherwise
